price: On that Day, no excuse will benefit the wrongdoers, nor will they be allowed to make amends.
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
